about_the_game:
Inspired, dramatic and poetic, this modern day sounding music pack will find a nice home in your modern / city themed games. Sometimes techno, sometimes chill acid jazz, with tasty hints and interesting blends of modern hip-hop, electronica and EDM, this well-produced pack has elements that cover many modern game settings.

Grab this pack full of modern cinematic sounding loops, interesting sound production and super up to date big-city vibes for your big-city or modern-themed games!

Features:

* 21 modern, urban, diverse songs
* .ogg, .mp3, .m4a, .wav file formats included
* Royalty-free music for use with RPG Maker VX Ace or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:

01_東京詩篇（TOKYO POETRY)
02_進まない時計 (Stopped clock)
03_離人症 (Depersonalizatiion)
04_Office Time Blues
05_秘密の地下道 (Secret underpass)
06_手児奈 (TEKONA)
07_コンビニエンスストア (convenience store)
08_メトロの裏技 (Trick of metro)
09_違和感 (Discomfort)
10_都市機構 (Urban mechanism)
11_緩やかな日常 (Looser days)
12_境界線（border)
13_新宿 at night(Shinjyuku at night)
14_闇市 (Black market)
15_EDEN
16_品川駅のパラノイア (Paranoia at Shinagawa Station)
17_切り取られた神域 (Cropped sanctuary)
18_都市伝説 (Urban legemd)
19_餃子 (Dumplings)
20_Long goodbye
21_Ending

  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
